channel.title: [508]When I make myself admin or mod
channel.description:
FIXED
So when i go into mainsave and click my user change the 0 to a 2 for admin. Then i try log back and im starting at the beginning all over again. So it kept having i tried with different users but then i went into the login java file and made it so when i logged in with that user it would auto give me admin but it does not work no changes to my accounts.
Source: DrowningScape (PALi76) Client: IP changer Client
Fixed Downloaded Dev C++ made it work
